file.name: PaymentInitiation.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Payment Initiation
  description: This service domain provides a customer payment service. It captures the payer and payee details and other key properties of the payment and orchestrates the transaction. It provides support for repeating/scheduled payments
  version: 10.0.0
servers:
- description: SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
  url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/BIAN-3/PaymentInitiation/10.0.0
paths:
  /PaymentInitiation/Initiate:
    post:
      tags:
      - CR - PaymentInitiationTransaction
      summary: InCR Initiate a payment transaction
      description: InCR Initiate a payment transaction
      operationId: Initiate
      parameters: []
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/InitiatePaymentInitiationTransactionRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InitiatePaymentInitiationTransactionResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /PaymentInitiation/{paymentinitiationId}/Update:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - PaymentInitiationTransaction
      summary: UpCR Update details of a payment transaction instruction
      description: UpCR Update details of a payment transaction instruction
      operationId: Update
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/PaymentInitiationID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/UpdatePaymentInitiationTransactionRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UpdatePaymentInitiationTransactionResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /PaymentInitiation/{paymentinitiationId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - CR - PaymentInitiationTransaction
      summary: ReCR Retrieve details about a payment transaction
      description: ReCR Retrieve details about a payment transaction
      operationId: Retrieve
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/PaymentInitiationID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrievePaymentInitiationTransactionResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /PaymentInitiation/{paymentinitiationId}/Compliance/{complianceId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - BQ - Compliance
      summary: ReBQ Retrieve details about a payment transaction compliance check
      description: ReBQ Retrieve details about a payment transaction compliance check
      operationId: RetrieveCompliance
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/PaymentInitiationID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ComplianceID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrieveComplianceResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /PaymentInitiation/{paymentinitiationId}/FundingCheck/{fundingcheckId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - BQ - FundingCheck
      summary: ReBQ Retrieve details about a payment transaction funds available
      description: ReBQ Retrieve details about a payment transaction funds available
      operationId: RetrieveFundingCheck
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/PaymentInitiationID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/FundingCheckID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrieveFundingCheckResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /PaymentInitiation/{paymentinitiationId}/OrderInitiation/{orderinitiationId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - BQ - OrderInitiation
      summary: ReBQ Retrieve details about the payment order initiation
      description: ReBQ Retrieve details about the payment order initiation
      operationId: RetrieveOrderInitiation
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/PaymentInitiationID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/OrderInitiationID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrieveOrderInitiationResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
components:
  schemas:
    PaymentInitiationTransaction:
      type: object
      properties:
        PaymentTransactionType:
          type: string
        RecurringPaymentRecord:
          type: string
        RecurringPaymentCustomerReference:
          type: object
        RecurringPaymentReference:
          type: object
        CustomerReference:
          type: object
        PaymentTransaction:
          type: string
        PayerReference:
          type: object
        PayerBankReference:
          type: object
        PayerProductInstanceReference:
          type: object
        PayeeReference:
          type: object
        PayeeBankReference:
          type: object
        PayeeProductInstanceReference:
          type: object
        Amount:
          type: string
        Currency:
          type: string
        DateType:
          type: string
        Date:
          type: string
        PaymentFeesOrCharges:
          type: string
        PaymentMechanism:
          type: string
        PaymentPurpose:
          type: string
        DocumentDirectoryEntryInstanceReference:
          type: object
        DocumentContent:
          type: string
    FundingCheck:
      type: object
      properties:
        PaymentTransactionFundingCheckResult:
          type: string
    OrderInitiation:
      type: object
      properties:
        PaymentOrderProcedureInstanceReference:
          type: object
        PaymentOrderProcedureInstanceStatus:
          type: string
        OrderInitiationTaskResult:
          type: string
    Compliance:
      type: object
      properties:
        PaymentTransactionComplianceCheckType:
          type: string
        PaymentTransactionComplianceCheckResult:
          type: string
        PaymentTransactionComplianceTaskResult:
          type: string
    HTTPError:
      type: object
      properties:
        status_code:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
        message:
          type: string
    InitiatePaymentInitiationTransactionRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        PaymentInitiationTransaction:
          type: object
          properties:
            PaymentTransactionType:
              type: string
            RecurringPaymentRecord:
              type: string
            RecurringPaymentCustomerReference:
              type: object
            RecurringPaymentReference:
              type: object
            PayerReference:
              type: object
            PayerBankReference:
              type: object
            PayerProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            PayeeReference:
              type: object
            PayeeBankReference:
              type: object
            PayeeProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            Amount:
              type: string
            Currency:
              type: string
            DateType:
              type: string
            PaymentMechanism:
              type: string
            PaymentPurpose:
              type: string
            DocumentDirectoryEntryInstanceReference:
              type: object
            DocumentContent:
              type: string
    InitiatePaymentInitiationTransactionResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        PaymentInitiationTransaction:
          type: object
          properties:
            RecurringPaymentRecord:
              type: string
            RecurringPaymentCustomerReference:
              type: object
            RecurringPaymentReference:
              type: object
            DateType:
              type: string
            PaymentFeesOrCharges:
              type: string
            DocumentDirectoryEntryInstanceReference:
              type: object

      type: object
      properties:
        PaymentInitiationTransaction:
          type: object
          properties:
            PaymentTransactionType:
              type: string
            RecurringPaymentRecord:
              type: string
            RecurringPaymentCustomerReference:
              type: object
            RecurringPaymentReference:
              type: object
            PayerReference:
              type: object
            PayerBankReference:
              type: object
            PayerProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            PayeeReference:
              type: object
            PayeeBankReference:
              type: object
            PayeeProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            Amount:
              type: string
            Currency:
              type: string
            DateType:
              type: string
            PaymentFeesOrCharges:
              type: string
            PaymentMechanism:
              type: string
            PaymentPurpose:
              type: string
            DocumentDirectoryEntryInstanceReference:
              type: object
            DocumentContent:
              type: string

          type: object

            PayerProductInstanceReference:

            PayeeReference:

              type: object
            PayeeProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            Amount:
              type: string
            Currency:
              type: string
            DateType:
              type: string
            PaymentFeesOrCharges:
              type: string
            PaymentMechanism:
              type: string
            PaymentPurpose:
              type: string
            DocumentDirectoryEntryInstanceReference:
              type: object

              type: string

      name: paymentinitiationId
      in: path
      required: true
      style: simple
      explode: false
      schema:
        type: string
    FundingCheckID:
      name: fundingcheckId
      in: path
      required: true
      style: simple
      explode: false
      schema:
        type: string
    OrderInitiationID:
      name: orderinitiationId
      in: path
      required: true
      style: simple
      explode: false

    ComplianceID:

  requestBodies:

    UpdatePaymentInitiationTransactionRequest:

      content:

...
